text: The Mayor shall provide sufficient space for the Commission to operate and may detail personnel to assist the Commission in its work. The Mayor shall also direct all agencies contacted by the Commission to give their full cooperation.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Operational space and personnel; agency cooperation.
